name: Sticks And Bones
description: Follow the story of a brave, courageous and handsome pirate as he continues his journey to find THE treasure after his death!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
